variants.Description in input context: This variant was found to cause a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Readout description.Result Description: The expression of the mutant protein was reduced by 50% compared to the wild-type protein.

Biological replicates.Description: More information needed for a definitive answer.

Technical replicates.Description: More information needed for a definitive answer.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Validation controls P/LP.Counts: More information needed for a definitive answer.

Validation controls B/LB.Counts: More information needed for a definitive answer.

Statistical analysis method.Description: More information about the statistical analysis method would be needed to confirm this.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: 50% protein expression might be the threshold, but more information about the assay and the context would be needed to confirm this.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Any value less than 50% might be considered as an abnormal result, but more information about the assay and the context would be needed to confirm this.
